Headline: Green & Orange Line Service Delayed at Roosevelt
ShortDescription: Green & Orange Line trains continue to stand at Roosevelt due to a door problem. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green & Orange Line trains are standing at Roosevelt due to a door problem. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines. These may include: #20 Madison, #3 Cottage Grove, #29 State, #63  63trd and #62 Archer.

Shuttle buses are available between State/Lake and Halsted to provide connecting service for Orange Line Service. Shuttle buses are available from State/Lake and 35th to provide connecting service for Green Line Service. 

 

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 95th- bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem at North/Clybourn. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem at North/Clybourn.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
